job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates direct involvement in enhancing or refining the capabilities of an AI system, which falls under the scope of AI model improvement and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI-generated outputs is a direct input for model refinement and training, aligning with the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions participation in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', which is a core aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies in AI suggests development and integration work, which is part of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
job_tasks.justification: Integrating human expertise with AI capabilities implies working on the AI's understanding and response mechanisms, relating to model design and improvement.
This phrase highlights the objective of customer support, which is a business context that the AI solutions need to serve.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes improving and fine-tuning AI systems based on human feedback, directly aligning with 'Modeling' tasks in generative AI. Phrases like 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' and 'improving the AI system' are strong indicators. While some software development aspects are present, the core focus is on the iterative improvement and integration of AI capabilities.
